<Soolamangalam Jayalakshmi
1:
--------------------
Text: Soolamangalam Sisters:  They were early singers in the trend of duo singing in Carnatic music, which started in the 1950s, with performers like Radha Jayalakshmi, and later continued by Bombay Sisters, Ranjani-Gayatri, Mambalam Sisters, Bangalore Sisters and Priya Sisters
Triplets:<Soolamangalam Sisters
